column4: I'm using Ubuntu 7.10, I'm having GREAT difficulty with my "Trash Bin".  Any help?
How do I "Force" empty my ".Trash-Misteralexander" folder???
and paste the output on http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org
see the last line? /media/disk is your SD flash. so type, in the terminal:
=>  Nothing happened.  I typed "ls .Trash-misteralexander" but nothing happened.
see mount o utput in that pastebin
it should say for /media/disk in options "ro"
ill show you, link me to other paste please
=> http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/56133/  <-- That's the entire Terminal screen, it's everything typed and resulted.
